segments.text: What does your sister look like , Mike ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , she ’ s tall and pretty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose so . We ’ re both friendly and easy-going .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is she as clever as you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , she ’ s not as clever as me .
segments.speaker: S2
